评论概述: Fabric is no good Hot stuffy no breathability
评论详情: Had high hopes for this, bought because of reduced price, but the fabric was terrible.  It doesn’t feel good on, it’s stuffy and hot, no breathability, says 50 cotton 50 polyester, I have other things that are actually that… this feels like all polyester or a mix of recycled plastic and polyester.  The sizing and fit overall was just ok, too tight in the neck area.  Just felt stuffy and hot.  Not a fan of this at all. If I’m paying 40 dollars for a sweatshirt, it needs to feel good on and be a nice fit!  This missed the mark.
So comfortable.  The hood protects my neck from drafts. I like no strings because they won’t tangle. Also the front pocket is perfect in size, and large enough for both hands at same time.  Perfect!

I recently added the Trendy Queen Women's Oversized Hoodie to my wardrobe, and it’s quickly become a go-to for my chilly days. Here’s why I’m obsessed:  What I Love:  Super Cozy Fleece: The soft fleece material keeps me warm and snug all day long. It’s perfect for those cooler fall and winter days when you want to feel comfy without sacrificing style. Oversized Fit: The relaxed, oversized fit gives it a laid-back vibe that’s both trendy and comfortable. It’s great for layering over leggings, jeans, or even cozy joggers. Versatile Style: Whether you’re lounging at home, heading out for errands, or meeting friends, this hoodie pairs perfectly with almost anything. The simple yet stylish design works with so many outfits. Long Sleeve & Hooded: The long sleeves and built-in hood make it the ideal choice for staying warm while looking chic. Plus, the hood adds an extra layer of coziness when you need it. Perfect for Layering: Whether you’re layering it under a jacket or wearing it on its own, this hoodie is an easy way to make a fashion statement with minimal effort. Why It’s Worth It: This oversized hoodie is a must-have for any fall or winter wardrobe. It’s comfortable, stylish, and perfect for layering. I love how versatile it is – I can wear it with just about anything, and it still looks fabulous!  ⭐ Rating: 5/5 If you're looking for a cozy yet stylish hoodie that will keep you warm all season long, this Trendy Queen Oversized Hoodie is the one to grab! It's a total fall/winter wardrobe staple.
